name: Grandma's kiss
description:
Come and kiss grandma! You don't want to, but you have to. Unless... Try to repel your grandma and her replicas with all your weapons. How long will you last before the inevitable?

Made by Julian & Léo

Note: the web embedded version is a postjam version (with audio). To play the ludum version (without audio), please download the zip file for Windows marked as "ludum version" .
